EmailTemplate.subject: Turbonomic conversation follow up (1494512709.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Hi Marielena, Thank you for taking the time to speak with me today. I’ll follow up with Jorge and see if he would be open to an introduction over the next couple of weeks. Below is some information about Turbonomic and how we’ve helped other counties around Florida and the country to increase their virtualized footprint at a lower cost. Turbonomic uses patented automation at every layer of the infrastructure to provide a unique approach that is different from the VSuite of tools and does what VMware’s VRops and VSphere <[[http://mkto-sjp0104.com/ol/jEFVdcDII1xQsRpg5uiMMKvivTDUe5u9qKgwWbq2n59ziQVuYOPLdRGphcBWFZZvNa%2DaCAZNQsIylEpLFL3FOoVJ%5FqhZA0CkWTexhKDXboNHcJR6zshl9r2olmMKp5uXm1iRWQkLWGV%2DZVuwXbw6ghXJKalxUwi3zlKTGJ0nxCo%5Fo60G8Z6gTYez4166%5FU%5F%5F5h%2DCGGVf7O6830iSKKByos5R6nspxlsKSdmmzi%5Fhz5ICmHQW0sJ8tC8%5F79J4DZpuxymQXHazvY71afxUepinlLD%2Dr8R7NkoGo7d%5FeGP7P1m%2DVp6ZTg9kyEHVgjMQH2pXKz8DPOQbxDmjjypZesEYRC3tjCgU6WgYh%5FFM2oTOqCzDTijrCHnriDeR3Q2HMZcG21bDmPsv4i7aPRrq19lrU2KtWM%5Fnnl6yFMTKgnZhRdVuc9MQeYCb4NnszNYxgSvuARGYxv6gGUFqdeM%2C/jUlVdc3KI1lNoVdlsbPWN7vhmzDGf5a7vvJtG%5Fjp1N8x0EZqPO%5FANQ752pxEDp5tcLSWFRYAAN0y4TNnDO2BaZJC9btKAlKmUTqxg67XUIBLdb1yz%5F5zqf%2DpiWsO%5FdTX1F3BGRQKHVV7SSC8bvkhiS28M80WDyTXwlHgGI8Glxcw1Zol8YiIUeSFvXKt5R%5FUsTKtGRx4zNCU012lO4pzkYU2r0sV%2DElrZfSu1RPI9I8vmwMTpv1toyN%5F0P80IcR4ux7UWzbZvb%5FtZeJ0R%2DCm3cD8t%5FICeE0Or9Y7eW31JA6bC62ySyx%2D5F6OjmIpaX1vKyABGrJ7wQO8h3kPYO0xcXifkTA58EJs5YZ28rCusCO5O07LOCHz8AStmyaMGaYjhHWfi4QluGzaOhfR6%2DBoDBe5O9f0lkSTQMHBgk5kdKpZW8krBuCaw%5FK38NM%5F8zTcIBeiy9K9EBB%5FMI82t8q0rcuXqdiDtiyHqwk6oQ%2C%2C]]> can’t to allow our customers to prevent problems from ever entering their environment. Typically teams run into three separate questions when continuing to virtualize within their infrastructure: · Are the virtual machines properly sized and placed within the infrastructure so we know the applications are getting the right resources they need in order to run optimally? · Do we have enough capacity within our existing infrastructure to onboard X numbers of virtual machines? · Are the virtual machines onboard and sized properly? And how will they affect every layer of the stack from storage to the applications? Turbonomic answers all these questions for you and your infrastructure team as it uses our automation to create tighter VM to host densities while still delivering a higher level of performance. This leads to saving thousands on Capex within the infrastructure as you grow. Don’t hesitate to reach out if you have any questions or would like to see the platform live. City of Garland, TX <[[https://turbonomic.com/wp-content/uploads/Turbonomic-CityGarland-Success-Story.pdf]]> Lower Infrastructure Costs with Turbonomic <[[http://info.turbonomic.com/ol/jE9SdsbKLFxQsRpg5uiMMKvivTDUe5u9qKgwWbq2n59ziQVuYOPLdRGphcBWFZZvNa%2DaCAZNQsIylEpLFL3FOoVJ%5FqhkHlK3XnXYkqTfYa1rfb1p3cNk66CEymQApJOBnVGKHEYKHSEqYR6Je759qQnSKZYLcRq%2DqHfKBbMKzgUSgeUG4bS7f5S48EOU9lPo9huEGXV57e2vwFaGBrR%2DtfMntng9uAQfSsb%2DzwH%2Dk4URnHYU0tZ9tAZZ%2DsZRcNBG6j7aWAPZ%5FY2qH7FvT5Omqtrfqfl7Yw0O2dx6SkbjeFi%2DJZyadHtl8CShgwxqaC9oDh4LMOIhyyWOiC1zUcECfC2CgSou4nwI8pJA3Nuothu2ZG3QGAX5kkKn3jW5CJUr53iHn%5FcK8xD%5FBwnvyLpteGOTX%5FXShliyS8nZunYZSaEPG4Y%2C/j0lWcMDMLFlNoVdlsbPWNrz%5FnTrOdZWhuPJ%2DBvqpwt0x3V19ZqOQNUr7t8deF89gfdy%5FKjgaMKFq8idLP8XBZq8W%2Dd8LDW%2DnUjXVuYvXfptfeeVY8%5FlorvCDzzIOrselu13APEhLE1UpNyLeZbA3gS%2DqOZ4lTQKU7mnUNpM2ji1FhrIXwoE%2C]]> Bes regards, James Wilcox Turbonomic <[[https://turbonomic.com/product/#lower-infrastructure-costs]]>C: (508) 479 7516 Email: james.wilcox@turbonomic.com <[[mailto:james.wilcox@turbonomic.com]]>
